Hero.heading: Secret territory challenge
Hero.body: Welcome to download the preemptive experience version

User.title: Player information
User.vacban: The current account has been blocked by the anti cheating system.

SocialMedia.heading: Preemptive experience description
SocialMedia.content: During the preemptive experience phase, the module will be updated frequently, which may cause the loss of ladder data. After the preemptive experience, all data will be deleted. If you have any questions or suggestions in the experience stage, you are welcome to post on the mushroom forum. At present, the anti cheating function will check the cheating software. Please don't run the game with the cheating software. The mod file will be checked after the official version goes online. At present, the ladder list is for reference only.

Ranking.title: S1 season little secret land ladder list
Ranking.Greattitle: S1 season secret land ladder list
Ranking.subtitle: Due to the randomness of monster refresh in the magic gathering place, the heaven ladder list in the little secret place is only for reference and does not represent the player's real level.
